Partial Functions

DM
Jun 19, 2020

For a partial function $f$ is an assignment of a unique element $a$ (in a subset of Domain of $A$ called domain of definition) to a unique element $b \in B$.

Functions

DM
Jun 18, 2020

Given two nonempty Sets $A$ and $B$. A function $f$ from $A$ to $B$ is assignment of a single element of $B$ to each element in $A$.

Ceiling Function

DM
Jun 16, 2020

Ceiling function maps the value to the closest integers greater than or equal to value.

Floor Function

DM
Jun 15, 2020

Floor function maps the value to the closest integers less than or equal to value.
